kese wethath, palatha thula pamanak bas ratha dhawanaya siduwana bawata da ohu prakasha kala.emenma, heta sita basnahira palathe margastha magi prawahana adhikariya magin kriyathmaka bas ratha 808k saukhya kramawedawalata yatathwa dhawanayata yodawana bawa basnahira palath margastha magi prawahana adhikariye sabhapathi prasanna sanjiwa prakasha kala.kese wethath lanka paudgalika bas himiyange sangamaye sabhapathi gamunu wijerathna sadahan kale heta dinayedi dhawanaya kerenne bas rathawalin  siyayata 25ka pramanayak bawayi.motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwe narahenpita saha werahara karyala sewa katayuthu sandaha yali heta sita wiwrutha kerenawa.
